          <title>
            <string language="en">Magnetic field lines of a magnet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magnetisch fangen Sie Zeilen eines 
Magneten auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lignes de champ magnétique d'un aimant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Linhas do campo magnético de um ímã</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Righe del campo magnetico di un magnete</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γραμμές μαγνητικών πεδίων ενός μαγνήτη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Líneas del campo magnético de un imán</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an experiment to investigate the magnetic field lines of a bar magnet by using iron fillings.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">card</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">field distribution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">field lines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">iron fillings</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field lines</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung stellt dar, daß ein Experiment, 
zum das magnetische nachzuforschen Zeilen eines Stabmagneten 
auffangen, indem es Eisenfüllungen verwendet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre que une expérience 
étudiait les lignes de champ magnétique d'une barre aimantée en 
utilisant des remplissages de fer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma experiência para 
investigar as linhas do campo magnético de um ímã de barra usando 
enchimentos do ferro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un esperimento per 
studiare le righe del campo magnetico di un magnete di barra usando i 
materiali da otturazione del ferro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ένα πείραμα για να 
ερευνήσει τις γραμμές μαγνητικών πεδίων ενός μαγνήτη ράβδων με 
τη χρησιμοποίηση των γαρνιτουρών σιδήρου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un experimento para 
investigar las líneas del campo magnético de un imán de barra 
usando rellenos del hierro.</string>
          </description>
